org.apache.heron.packing

Class AssertPacking

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.heron.packing.AssertPacking

  • public final class AssertPacking
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for common test assertions related to packing

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void assertContainerCpu(java.util.Set<PackingPlan.ContainerPlan> containerPlans, double maxCpuforResources)
      Verifies that the CPU allocated for every container in a packing plan is less than a given maximum value.
      static void assertContainerRam(java.util.Set<PackingPlan.ContainerPlan> containerPlans, ByteAmount maxRamforResources)
      Verifies that the RAM allocated for every container in a packing plan is less than a given maximum value.
      static void assertInstanceCpu(java.util.Set<PackingPlan.ContainerPlan> containerPlans, java.lang.String boltName, java.lang.String spoutName, java.lang.Double expectedBoltCpu, java.lang.Double expectedSpoutCpu)
      Verifies that the containerPlan has at least one bolt named boltName with CPU equal to expectedBoltCpu and likewise for spouts.

      Verifies that the containerPlan has at least one bolt named boltName with RAM equal to expectedBoltRam and likewise for spouts.
      static void assertNumInstances(java.util.Set<PackingPlan.ContainerPlan> containerPlans, java.lang.String component, int numInstances)
      Verifies that the containerPlan contains a specific number of instances for the given component.

    • Method Detail

      • assertInstanceRam

        public static void assertInstanceRam(java.util.Set<PackingPlan.ContainerPlan> containerPlans,
                                     java.lang.String boltName,
                                     java.lang.String spoutName,
                                     ByteAmount expectedBoltRam,
                                     ByteAmount expectedSpoutRam)
        Verifies that the containerPlan has at least one bolt named boltName with RAM equal to expectedBoltRam and likewise for spouts. If notExpectedContainerRam is not null, verifies that the container RAM is not that.

      • assertInstanceCpu

                                     java.lang.String boltName,
                                     java.lang.String spoutName,
                                     java.lang.Double expectedBoltCpu,
                                     java.lang.Double expectedSpoutCpu)
        Verifies that the containerPlan has at least one bolt named boltName with CPU equal to expectedBoltCpu and likewise for spouts. If notExpectedContainerCpu is not null, verifies that the container CPU is not that.
